note: This is my account, and it's here for you to observe my behavior that I display across this network. Primarily this is a pleroma account hosted by our own virtual server space. We are nof.st.... the "nof" is the abbreviation of Noise Of Freedom. It's the sound of all that is free. We stand for freedom of speech and everything else that is free. Anything you can ponder for freedom is all that we are destined for. Hopefully as the network grows more members will register on this instance. It will allow you access to the fediverse. We will also be open to suggestions to customize this instance. We also have a local chat here that I'd like to utilize one day.
